00059 #define FIX(x) (Identifier)(x+0.5)
00060 // implements a vector of fixed length 3
00061 class Vector3 {
00062  protected:
00063   double *m_Data;
00064  public:
00065   Vector3( void );
00066   Vector3( const Vector3& v );
00067   Vector3( double x);
00068   Vector3( double x, double y, double z );
00069 
00070   template < typename real_t > Vector3( const real_t* x0 );
00071 
00072   ~Vector3();
00073 
00074   Vector3& operator=( const Vector3& b );
00075   Vector3& operator=( const double& x );
00076   Vector3& operator-( void );
00077   Vector3 operator+( const Vector3& x ) const;
00078   Vector3 operator-( const Vector3& x ) const;
00079   Vector3 operator*( const double& x );
00080   Vector3 operator/( const double& x );
00081   Vector3& operator+=( const Vector3& x );
00082   Vector3& operator-=( const Vector3& x );
00083   Vector3& operator*=( const double& x );
00084   Vector3& operator/=( const double& x );
00085   double& operator() ( const unsigned i );
00086   //dot product
00087   double operator*( const Vector3& vb ) const;
00088   // cross product
00089   Vector3 operator^( const Vector3& vb ) const;
00090   double norm( void ) const;
00091   double norm2( void ) const;
00092   Vector3& normalize( void );
00093 };

00099  protected:
00100   double *m_Data;

00107   double operator() ( Identifier row, Identifier col ) const;

00112   Matrix33& operator+=( const Matrix33& m );
00113   Matrix33& operator-=( const Matrix33& m );
